projects.

projects.

Meowstagram

Meowstagram

A social media application modeled after Instagram. Users can follow each other, post images, comment on posts, like posts, message other users, and more.

Built using React, React Router, and Firebase.

auditty

auditty

An e-commerce web application which allows users to add items to their cart, edit item quantities, and remove items.

Built using React and React Router.

CV Creator

CV Creator

A web application for creating a styled personal CV.

Built using React.

Battleship

Battleship

Play against an AI in the classic strategy guessing game, Battleship.

Built using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.
